thread.title: Grace Appoints Mills as Vice President, Integrated Supply Chain

author: cnbc.com
title: Grace Appoints Mills as Vice President, Integrated Supply Chain
text:
COLUMBIA, Md., Feb. 08, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- W. R. Grace & Co. (NYSE:GRA) has appointed Samuel A. Mills as Vice President, Integrated Supply Chain with responsibility for its global manufacturing, procurement, order fulfillment, logistics, and supply chain planning activities.
Mills comes to Grace from Honeywell International, where he served as Vice President, Integrated Supply Chain for several of its businesses. During his career, Mills has held a number of leadership positions throughout the integrated supply chain, including manufacturing, continuous improvement, and sourcing roles. He earned a Bachelor’s degree in Economics from the University of Kansas and an MBA from the University of Notre Dame.
“Sam has a strong record of success as an integrated supply chain leader,” said Grace President and Chief Operating Officer Hudson La Force. “His strengths as a leader and experience and success in a sophisticated global operating environment align well with our growth and productivity opportunities.”
About Grace
Built on talent, technology, and trust, Grace is a leading global supplier of catalysts and engineered materials. The company’s two industry-leading business segments—Catalysts Technologies and Materials Technologies—provide innovative products, technologies, and services that enhance the products and processes of our customers around the world. With approximately 3,700 employees, Grace operates and/or sells to customers in over 60 countries. More information about Grace is available at grace.com .
